thread.title: Alan Colmes, longtime Fox News host and commentator, dead at 66
thread.title_full: Alan Colmes, longtime Fox News host and commentator, dead at 66

author: DAN GOOD
title: Alan Colmes, longtime Fox News host and commentator, dead at 66
text:
Alan Colmes, longtime Fox News host and commentator, dead at 66 following brief illness Alan Colmes, longtime Fox News host and commentator, dead at 66 Alan Colmes was the co-host of "Hannity & Colmes" from 1996 until 2009. (Duffy-Marie Arnoult/WireImage) NEW YORK DAILY NEWS Thursday, February 23, 2017, 9:48 AM 
Radio and TV host and political commentator Alan Colmes is dead at age 66 following a brief illness, Fox News confirmed. 
Colmes — a New York City native — was the co-host of "Hannity & Colmes" with Sean Hannity from 1996 until 2009. 
Colmes is survived by his wife, Jocelyn Elise Crowley.
